Comment: > He didn't come here to actually improve anything.  This is the thing. What did he actually accomplish? By objective measures, DOGE did not save any money. They did not increase government efficiency in any way. So what the fuck was the point of all of those building closures, return-to-work orders, mass layoffs, and the stupid weekly 5-points emails?  They claimed to find tons of evidence of fraud and abuse... fraud is a crime. Where are the indictments for fraud? Why aren't the alleged fraudsters being prosecuted for their alleged crimes?  If you commit fraud, getting fired is the least of punishments you should expect. If they had actual evidence of comitting fraud with taxpayer money, that should be a huge deal! So why isn't it?
